job_tasks.phrase: de ambitie om als Quality Engineer een sleutelrol te spelen in het softwareonwikkelproces
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the role's importance and impact within the software development lifecycle, indicating an understanding of its business context.

job_tasks.phrase: Als Quality Engineer ben jij de cruciale schakel tussen gebruikers, ontwikkelaars en analisten.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the bridging role of a Quality Engineer, implying an understanding of different stakeholder needs and business processes.

job_tasks.phrase: Het in kaart brengen van risico's, verstrekken van advies en het verkrijgen van waardevolle feedback uit applicaties behoren tot jouw verantwoordelijkheden.
job_tasks.justification: These are business-oriented activities that require understanding the implications of quality issues and providing actionable advice.

job_tasks.phrase: Je draagt tevens de moderne kwaliteitsgedachte uit naar jouw omgeving.
job_tasks.justification: This implies promoting and implementing quality standards, which is a business-level concern.
Directly mentions the use of Generative AI, a core component of modern modeling and AI application development.

job_tasks.phrase: Generative AI zoals ChatGPT , Prompt Engineering en National Language Processing heeft een gigantische impact op ons vakgebied.
job_tasks.justification: Specifies generative AI technologies and their impact, pointing towards model-related activities.

job_tasks.phrase: het inzetten van deze tooling voor testontwerp, testframeworks en het identificeren en rapporteren van bevindingen.
job_tasks.justification: Describes the application of generative AI for specific tasks within testing, which can involve model adaptation or advanced usage.
Mentions a specific automation framework used in software development for testing.
Indicates involvement in testing different layers of software applications, a key aspect of software development.
Reinforces the use of a specific tool for software testing and development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: het ontdekken van jouw sterke- en verbeterpunten en pas deze toe als professional
job_tasks.justification: While a soft skill, applying these to become a professional implies integrating learning into practical software engineering work.

job_tasks.phrase: het inzetten van deze tooling voor testontwerp, testframeworks
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, 'testframeworks' can imply the operationalization and maintenance of testing infrastructure, which has overlap.

soft_skills.phrase: als Quality Engineer ben jij de cruciale schakel tussen gebruikers, ontwikkelaars en analisten
Ontwikkel jezelf in Quality Engineering & Testing met ons traineeship
ontdek jouw sterke- en verbeterpunten en pas deze toe als professional
het in kaart brengen van risico's

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on Quality Engineering and traditional testing roles, with an emphasis on soft skills and learning. While it mentions Generative AI and Prompt Engineering as tools for testing, it doesn't indicate core responsibilities in developing, fine-tuning, or deploying GenAI models. The primary focus remains on applying AI as a tool within a quality assurance context.
